title: 2016 Republican National Convention-Full Uncommented 720p WebRip
description:
Torrent created to provide a reference point comparing the two conventions of both  major parties in the US 2016 presidential election. The difference to the Democratic National Convention becomes clear. Very clear. 

Its important that people have the reference recordings of these conventions, to hold their leaders accountable after the election in November 2016.

If you live in the US, please go and register to vote, if you haven't already! 

Please support progressive politics for climate justice, racial justice, economic justice, social justice, peace and unity! Vote for Jill Stein of the Green Party and continue to support Bernie Sanders' efforts to reform the Democratic Party from the inside!

Collaborate instead of collapse!


* A warning: This recording contains a lot of right wing propaganda! Watch with care!

* Compare this to the DNC 2016 recordings - see previous torrents!

* Check https://democracynow.org for real reporting on the issues that matter
